title: Full Category Request Schema
description: A complete Category item as stored in the backend storage

userId.title: userId property schema
userId.description: id of the user who created a Category item - managed by authentication layer

itemId.title: itemId property schema
itemId.description: a unique id for an item

createdAt.title: createdAt property schema
createdAt.description: date and time when an item was created

name.title: name property schema
name.description: name of a Category item (e.g. "Change a light bulb")

jsonSchema.title: jsonSchema property schema
jsonSchema.description: JSON Schema declaring the data model of Whatever items in the Category

uiSchema.title: uiSchema property schema
uiSchema.description: UI Schema describing additional data entry rules for Whatever items in the Category
